name: NinjaBattle: Defense RPG
description:
Defense battle RPG, with cool ninjas!

Destroy the enemies in a limited time frame!
Learn various Ninjutsu, Taijutsu and Genjutsu styles!
Strategically build your team with strong allies!
Collect amazing equipment, and become stronger through set effects!

▶Ninjutsu
Fire - Flame Burst, Thunder Flames, Fire Whirl, Phoenix Attack
Water - Whimsical Tides, Whirlpool, Prison of Frost, Toxic Swamp
Tree - Grasping Vines, Roots of Fury, Wrath of the Black Tortoise, Roots of Yggdrasil
Earth - Rock Fist, Groundbreaker, Ground Slam, Avalokiteshvara
▶Taijutsu
Frenzy, Clone, Eight Gates, Awakening
▶Genjutsu
Eye of Darkness, Spirit of the Great General, Eye of Despair, Time Rewind



- Request Board
Defeat strong bosses, and collect stronger items!
- Ninja Duel
Become THE most powerful ninja, and climb to the top of the rankings!
Who is the strongest of all?
- Ninja Village
Form a village with other players to complete tasks!
You must fight together to complete tasks!
- Village Duel
Which town will be strongest in Ninja Battle?
Fight against other villages, and collect your reward!
- Ninja Duel
We shall rise to the top of the Infinite Tower!
How far can your ninjas go? Find out now!
Train your ninjas, and reach the top of the Tower!
